sense.def:
Z besedo
at
povemo, kje se nekaj zgodi ali leži.

seg.quote: The play takes place at a beach club.
There was a knock at his door.

sense.def:
To look at something or someone
pomeni pogledati v smer, kjer nekaj ali nekdo je.
To direct something at someone
pomeni nekaj nameriti proti tistemu človeku.

seg.quote: They were staring at a garage roof.
Supporters threw petals at his car.

sense.def:
Z besedo
at
povemo, kdaj se nekaj zgodi.

seg.quote: She leaves her house every day at 11 a.m.

sense.def:
Z besedo
at
povemo, kako hitro ali pogosto se nekaj dogaja.

seg.quote: He hurtles through the air at 600 miles per hour.
The high technology companies have grown at an astonishing rate.

sense.def:
To buy or sell something at a particular price
pomeni, da tisto kupimo ali prodamo za tako ceno.

To be at lunch, dinner, or any other meal
pomeni jesti kosilo, večerjo ali kak drug obed.

To be working at something
pomeni, da se z nečim ukvarjamo.
To be aiming at something
pomeni, da poskušamo nekaj doseči.

seg.quote: It means working harder at your thesis.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
at someone's command
ali
at someone's invitation
, je to posledica ukaza ali vabila.

Z besedo
at
povemo, da je nekdo ali nekaj v določenem stanju ali položaju.

seg.quote: The two nations are at war.

sense.def:
Z besedo
at
povemo, kako je nekaj storjeno.

seg.quote: Guardsmen herded them back at gun point.

sense.def:
Z besedo
at
za glagolom povemo, da je nekaj storjeno z oklevanjem.

Kdor je
good at something
, tisto zna dobro. Kdor je
bad at something
, tisto počne slabo.

seg.quote: They seemed to be very good at reading.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
delighted, pleased
ali
appalled at something
, je zaradi tistega navdušen, vesel ali zgrožen.
